job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-10T22:17:39.000Z", "description": "

Employment Type: Full-time


Location: This opportunity will require once a month travel to Pennsylvania or Alabama. As you build your relationship with the team you may be allowed to work completely remote.


*Unfortunately, at this time my client can not transfer or sponsor visas*


I\u2019m currently working with an extremely exciting organization who are a leading distributor and producer of mining and metals materials. These materials are critical aspects used within the aerospace, energy markets, transportation, medical, and defense and other sectors. They have been in business for over 200 years through financial and world health crises and continue to thrive. Their diverse market portfolio allows all their employees to work in interesting spaces and learn about several industries that help power our world.


They are looking for Senior Data Scientist to produce machine learning solutions to help enhance the company\u2019s digital transformation.


Responsibilities:

\u00b7        Apply data science techniques to massive structured / unstructured data sets

\u00b7        Design and develop statistical & ML models

\u00b7        Design and conduct experiment for observational data to identify the factors associated with poor quality and process variability

\u00b7        Develop anomaly detection models

\u00b7        Communicate and democratize model findings very clearly and precisely with stakeholders

Requirements:

\u00b7        MS/PhD in quantitative field

\u00b7        4+ years of experience in data science

\u00b7        Proficiency programming in Python or R

\u00b7        Familiarity with cloud-based solutions (e.g. Azure, AWS EMR)

\u00b7        Strong practical knowledge of ML and statistics techniques


**If you are interested, please send me your resume, multiple time windows to speak, email, and phone number so I can book in it on our calendars. Additionally, referrals are appreciated.**
